txt.en: Unbreakable reduces your Incoming Damage. Mighty Roar will consume that effect to increase your enemies' Incoming Damage.
Umbari Armour of Unbreakable Steel\n(Max Level: 154)
Sweeping Riposte reduces the active cooldown of Sudden Defence by 2s.
Mighty Roar now replaces the Unbreakable buff with Unbroken, which lasts 120s.
